title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Cook the spaghetti. Fry the pancetta until crisp. Whisk the eggs and cheese together. Combine everything and season with black pepper.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato-based gravy.
instructions: Marinate the chicken in yogurt and spices. Grill the chicken. Cook the tomato puree and spices. Add the grilled chicken and heavy cream.
